_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four kinds of mice [an4.107:5.8]: One makes a hole but doesn’t live in it
One lives in a hole but doesn’t make it
One neither makes a hole nor lives in it
One both makes a hole and lives in it
The Four People Similar to Mice (a items: One makes a hole but doesn’t live in it
One lives in a hole but doesn’t make it
One neither makes a hole nor lives in it
One both makes a hole and lives in it
